title: NA offers Fateha for soldiers martyred in Kurram
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 22 (APP):The National Assembly on Saturday offered Fateha for five Pakistan Army soldiers who were martyred in a blast from an improvised explosive device (IED) in Khyber Pakhtunkhwaâ€™s Kurram district.
